title: JUST FOR FUN Ranked Team
body:
I'm creating a ranked 5's team for fun **AND FUN ONLY**. I'm Bronze II so don't join if you want everyone to do really well each game. The idea is to play ranked games and practice champions without any consequences. I haven't decided on a name for the team but if you want to join then add me on league "Renghis Khan" (without quotations) and join the chat "Renghis Chat" so we can talk about it. ELO DOES NOT MATTER
I can't stress enough that this is **FOR FUN AND FUN ONLY!!**
Don't expect to climb the ladder and become an amazing ranked team. **Just join if you want to practice ranked without losing Solo Queue ELO.**

replies.body: sounds cool, I might give it a shot
